org.opendaylight.controller.sal.networkconfig.bridgedomain

Interface IPluginInBridgeDomainConfigService

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IBridgeDomainConfigService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BridgeDomainConfigService

    public interface IPluginInBridgeDomainConfigService
    This interface defines bridge domain configuration service methods to be implemented by protocol plugins

      • createBridgeDomain

        Status createBridgeDomain(Node node,
                        java.lang.String bridgeIdentifier,
                        java.util.Map<ConfigConstants,java.lang.Object> params)
                          throws BridgeDomainConfigServiceException
        Create a Bridge Domain
        Parameters:
        node - Node serving this configuration service
        bridgeIdentifier - String representation of a Bridge Domain
        params - Map representation of config name (ConfigConstants) and Parameter value (represented as Object).
        Returns:
        Status.StatusCode.SUCCESS if bridge domain is created successfully. Failure Status otherwise.
        Throws:
        BridgeDomainConfigServiceException

      • getBridgeDomainNode

        Node getBridgeDomainNode(Node configNode,
                       java.lang.String bridgeIdentifier)
        Returns a Node dedicated to a Bridge Domain (if available) that is created using createBridgeDomain.
        Parameters:
        configNode - Node serving this configuration service.
        bridgeIdentifier - Name of the bridge domain that would map to a dedicated Node
        Returns:
        Node dedicated to a bridge domain that is created using createBridgeDomain. returns null if there is no such dedicated node is available or represented.

      • getNodeConnector

        NodeConnector getNodeConnector(Node configNode,
                             java.lang.String bridgeIdentifier,
                             java.lang.String portIdentifier)
        Returns a NodeConnector mapped to a Port (if available) that is created using addPort.
        Parameters:
        configNode - Node serving this configuration service.
        bridgeIdentifier - Name of the bridge domain that would map to a dedicated Node
        portIdentifier - String representation of a Port.
        Returns:
        NodeConnector that is mapped to a port created using addPort. returns null if there is no such nodeConnector is available or mapped.
